smp_control module¶

class smp_control.SMP_control(args, robot_config)¶

Bases: smp_thread.smp_thread_ros

This class provides the main functionality of running the algorithms homeostasis and homeokinesis on a ros enabled robot.

check_and_send_output()¶

Gets the output from the y matrix, checks the dimensionality and commands the robot class to send the output.

compute_new_output()¶

Computes a new output from the sensor readings and the controller variables. This output is saved to the y matrix.

exit_loop()¶

Ends the loop and saves the data to a pickle file

get_and_check_input()¶

Gathers the input from the robot and checks if the dimensionality is correct, then it saves the new input to the x matrix.

learning_step()¶

One learning step of the learning algorithm (homeostasis or homeokinesis)

run()¶

Main loop of the algorithms, runs until the maximum timesteps are reached or the loop is canceled.

smp_control.dtanh(x)¶

this is the derivative of the tanh function

smp_control.dynamic_importer(name)¶

Dynamically imports modules / classes

smp_control.idtanh(x)¶

this is the inverse of the tanh function, with a protection against zero division zero
